channel.title: blog | The Blog Of Julius Bartel

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello World

Welcome

Welcome to my humble blog. I will use this webpage to showcase my projects. Expect posts and projects about embedded programming and electronics, often related to music.

Where it runs

To teach me something about Linux, I decided to host this blog by myself. It runs on a Raspberry Pi with an SSD, sitting in my flat. The blog itself is based on Hugo with the Academic Theme.

Enjoy!
